metadata.synopsis: AD for Shuurga's memory imprint in the Tadpoling Centre, showing a memory from before she was imprisoned here.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Tadpoling Centre (ReCon command "oe tc_teleport")- Interact with S_COL_TadpolingCentre_MemoryImprint_002_47c6ba7b-bc6b-4ed3-80bc-5bb90d169464

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *This pod pulsates with the angry memories of Ravengard's search officer, Manip Shuurga. She laments her failure to locate him.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *This pod is empty, bereft of memories but for a single waft of frustrated fury.*
